bibl.title: Letter, John Delafield in New York, N.Y. to Eben Hazard.,1796 Jan. 31
bibl.note: Insurance Company of North America Records, 1792 December 1-1843 February 18

projectDesc.p: Machine-readable transcription created for the University of Tennessee Libraries Special Collections.

editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: G Lynchs Note was not left with Hazard or Addams to be put in unit and delayed by reasons then urged by You.___ I have no recollection what is become it _ after looking again and without success _ be kind enough when you pass that way to ask Mr. McConnel if He has any knowledge of it.

I doubt if your plan for Insurance as : Fire will become general_ if I understand it right your price is too high._ The Phonis in London Insure the Belvedere which is all Timber and distant from this City at 13/PCent.__ A more faithful description of My Stores cannot be given_ they are all of Timber The Buildings about them will be the same_ they are near, indeed close to the River and instant help all around __ at what Rate will you Ins: those Buildings _______
A new Marine Insurance Company is formed

Here the Names I inclose you_ and tom:w we chase 17Doiectorr_ our Capital depoiled 100m Dolls: and a further sum secured of 300m Dolls: add to this the property of the whole_ (for we have no Charter) may be considered as good security for what we may risk. ________
If you see no impropriety in the thing, I will thank you to send Me a Copy of your internal regulations _ The expence of transcribing I will gladly repay _ I will oblige. Yse. very truly
illegible._ not to store Hemp, Flax, Hay Straw, unthreshed Corn, Spirits of Turpentine, Turpentine, Pitch Tar, Rosin Gunpowder Shingles or Fodder
